string.value: As soon as you arrive in #m104000000#, find #b#p0002006##k, the motor-mouth salesman.
As soon as you arrive in #m104000000#, find #b#p0002006##k, the motor-mouth salesman.
You've talked to #b#p0002006##k the salesman about the #bMonster Book#k.

Hello, I'm #b#p0002006##k, the salesman who will give you the best deal of your life! I'm sure you're all very busy, but I've prepared something very special for you today. I am here to introduce the 'Monster Book' to the beginning Maple warriors and explain how this book will change your life! Set aside some time for this once-in-a-lifetime opportunity and you won't regret it~!
You can find me at the place where they build boats near the pier.
That's quite alright. I'll call you again when you visit #m104000000#.
